message: Let's be fair, I'll take a bit more
Let's be practical, Alice. I'm offering a slight advantage to me since I have time on my side. This ensures we both benefit rather than risking getting nothing.
I'll meet you halfway on the advantage, but I still think I deserve a bit more
Time is ticking, Alice. This is a fair offer considering the inflation. Let's secure our share before it's too late.
Split it almost evenly, considering inflation, we're both losing out if we don't agree soon
